author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: A timeless classic that explores the decadence and moral decay of the Roaring Twenties.

author: Harper Lee
review: A powerful narrative that addresses racial injustice and moral growth in a small Southern town.

author: George Orwell
review: A dystopian masterpiece that warns against totalitarianism and the erosion of individual freedom.

author: J.D. Salinger
review: An iconic portrayal of teenage angst and alienation in post-war America.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: A charming adventure tale set in Middle-earth, perfect for readers of all ages.
